Given the current state of the game, your avatar is positioned at (10, 13), and your last position was also (10, 13). Since your position hasn't changed after your last action, it likely indicates that your avatar may have rotated without moving.

There are several important points to consider:
- The surrounding cells from (10, 13) indicate the following:
  - (10, 13) -> Your Avatar (a)
  - (10, 12) -> (.) empty space
  - (10, 14) -> (w) wall (blocking your right)
  - (11, 13) -> (w) wall (below you)

To make progress, you can move up or left into the empty spaces, since the immediate right is a wall and downward is also blocked by a wall. 

Considering this analysis, the optimal move would be to move up towards (9, 13) since the location there is unblocked. 

Therefore, I will take the action to move up:

``` Action:3 ```

This action is expected to be beneficial as it allows me to navigate towards an open area, keeping in mind the strategy to avoid enemies and collect coins.

### Surroundings Analysis:
- (10, 12) -> empty space (.)
- (10, 14) -> wall (w)
- (11, 13) -> wall (w)

The only accessible tiles are (10, 12) directly to the left and (9, 13) above. Given that the position hasn't changed, I can either move left to collect more space or upwards to a higher row, which keeps options open for future moves.

Moving up to (9, 13) aligns with avoiding areas potentially close to the piranhas and will open up more possibilities in subsequent moves.

Therefore, I will take the action to move up:

``` Action:4 ```

This action should allow me to navigate towards an open area, opening up further strategies and reducing the risk of encountering the piranhas.
